body.p: Elisha Lamastus States that he now lives in the Town of Cloveport and at the time Margolyes kept tavern near Bennetsville Ky he lived in Bennitsville, that was well aquanted with Margolyes, has been at his house very often I have eat with him several times I always found plenty of Good and Substantial food for man & beast. I further State that the said Margolyes kept a good & sufficent stable, and provided in abundanse, I verily believe the Tavern was as well kept as any body should require for any country house, I further state that on one occasion the said Margolyes sent a horse to the stable that I had charge of not having Sufficient room for said horse and all the others that had stopped for the night with him, I have seen a sufficientcy of Good beds at said Tavern house, I have also ^seen^ corn & hay at his house and other feed for horses, Given under my hand this 23rd November 1861
Sworn to before me this 23rd November 1861
Edward Pate J P B C
